h3_title: Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide
content: Much like Captain Lotus-Vision, the second Captain of the Pagoda Realm is a creepy one, with a strange construct-like shape with four legs, housing an golden sphere adorned with dragons that serves as its central core. The rest of the construct is highly resistant to damage, meaning you'll need to stun it so that you can take a shot at its most vulnerable part.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Wise-Voice', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Wise-Voice' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Much like Captain Lotus-Vision, the second Captain of the Pagoda Realm is a creepy one, with a strange construct-like shape with four legs, housing an golden sphere adorned with dragons that serves as its central core. The rest of the construct is highly resistant to damage, meaning you'll need to stun it so that you can take a shot at its most vulnerable part.
